original: Ljungbergh, Oscar Anton, direktör, Jönköping, f. 30/9/75 i Götafors, Jön-köp. 1., av bruksförv. o. järnhandl. August L. o. Charlotta Hammargren. G. 07 m. Ada Skoglund. Barn: Carl f. 08, Nils 10, Lans 11, Ingrid 13, Karin 16. — Stud. v. h. a. 1. samt hand :sk. Bitr, o. förest, v. Ljungberghs Järnhand, i Skillingaryd 90-03, egen järnhand, o. åkdonsfabr. där 03, dir. f. samt inneh. av Ljungberghs Järnhand. A-B i Skillingaryd samt Handels A-B Oscar Ljungbergh i Jönköp. fr. 35, en av stift, av A-B Skillingaryds el :verk 11, ordf. i dess styr. Ordf. i Linnesjöns fiske-vårdsfören., hed :ordf. i Skillingaryds skyttegille, v. ordf. i JÖnköp. 1. jäg:-förb., mångårig led. av komm:nd o. kyrkoråd i Tofteryd m. m. Hobbies: jakt, fiske. RNO, RVO, RFinlVROlkl, ProPGM, Länsskytteförb. o. Skillingaryds skyttegilles förtjGM, Jönköp. 1. jäg.-förb. GHt.
translated:
Ljungbergh, Oscar Anton, director, Jönköping, b. September 30, 1875 in Götafors, Jönköping County, son of August Ljungbergh, a manager of a mining and iron trade business, and Charlotta Hammargren. Married in 1907 to Ada Skoglund. Children: Carl, born in 1908; Nils, born in 1910; Lans, born in 1911; Ingrid, born in 1913; Karin, born in 1916. 

Studied at a university college and commercial school. Worked as an assistant and later as a manager at Ljungbergh's Iron Trade in Skillingaryd from 1890 to 1903. Established his own iron trade and vehicle factory in 1903 and became director and owner of Ljungbergh's Iron Trade AB in Skillingaryd. Also involved in Handels AB Oscar Ljungbergh in Jönköping from 1935, a board member of Skillingaryd Power Plant AB since 1911, chairman of its board. Chairman of Linnesjöns Fishing Conservation Association, honorary chairman of Skillingaryds Shooting Association, vice chairman of Jönköping County Hunting Association, longtime member of local council and church council in Tofteryd, and more. Hobbies: hunting and fishing. Awarded with the Order of the North Star (Nederlands Orden), Royal Order of Vasa (Kungliga Vasaorden), Royal Order of the White Rose of Finland (Suomen Valkoisen Ruusun ritarikunta), Pro Patria with gold medal, County Shooting Association and Skillingaryd Shooting Association's merit medals, and Jönköping County Hunting Association's gold medal.

awards.name: Order of the North Star (Nederlandse Orden)
Royal Order of the White Rose of Finland (Suomen Valkoisen Ruusun ritarikunta)
Jönköping County Hunting Association Gold Medal
